attributes.action: reconsider his proposed tax to homes in desirable and picturesque areas;
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AN ENGLISHMAN'S HOME IS HIS CASTLE! Erm but only if it has a view of the chip shop and the local "Dog & Duck! What on earth is this mad mad mad country on??? Stop this nonsense now; If someone chooses to live in peace and serenity, don't penalise them for it any more than you would enforce a tax on someone living in the heart of a 24 hour non stop city like London and who CHOOSES to do so; Choice is the key word here; or are we now a Police state and no-one informed us!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
